item.title: Princess, Slay the Junk in that Trunk: No Magic Required
item.description:
Princess, Slay the Junk in that Trunk: No Magic Required

I’m sorry to break it to you Cinderella, but the reality is, those late nights spent feverishly shopping online for magical fat burning elixirs, the kind you drop a weeks wages on, are more likely to turn you into a pumpkin as opposed to a Victoria’s Secret Angel. Legitimate, quick fixes to losing weight are nothing more than a fairy tale.

item.title: I salute you Cheesy Weezies, but this is goodbye.
item.description:
I salute you Cheesy Weezies, but this is goodbye.

For the unacquainted, Cheesy Weezies are a Bay of Plenty delicacy from the 90's. Think: hot chips doused in mayo' and topped with melted cheese. Arguably they are a fat laden stack of carbohydrates, wrapped in newspaper and disguised as a delicious accompaniment to your battered fish. In short, they do not receive the heart foundation tick of approval.
